html:
{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header -%} {%- if not doc.get("print_heading") and not doc.get("select_print_heading") and doc.set("select_print_heading", _("Consignment Note")) -%}{%- endif -%} {{ add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) }}
Delivery Note: {{ doc.delivery_note }}
Date Of Delivery: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.date_of_delivery) }}
Mode Of Delivery: {{ doc.mode_of_delivery }}
Terms Of Delivery:
 {{ doc.terms_of_delivery }}
 Billing Address :
 {{ doc.delivery_address or ''}}

{%- for row in doc.item_details -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Code Item Name Quantity UOM Weight UOM
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_code }} {% if row.item_code != row.item_name -%}
Item Code: {{ row.item_code}} console.log(row.custom_serial_no) {%- endif %}
{{ row.item_name }}
 {{ row.qty }} {{ row.uom or row.stock_uom }} {{row.weight_uom or '' }}

Net Weight: {{ doc.net_weight_pkg}} Gross Weight: {{doc.gross_weight_pkg }}
Net Weight UOM : {{ doc.net_weight_uom or '' }} Gross Weight UOM: {{ doc.gross_weight_uom or '' }}
name: packing slip
